dt: {bc}a projecting part of a building (such as a church) that is usually semicircular in plan and vaulted

et: shortening of {et_link|apsis|apsis}, perhaps by analogy with {et_link|base:1|base:1} : {et_link|basis|basis}
shortdef: a projecting part of a building (such as a church) that is usually semicircular in plan and vaulted
